title: Mini-Ep 238: The Merest Hint of Shiny
itunes:title: Mini-Ep 238: The Merest Hint of Shiny
itunes:subtitle: Kate gets a life-changing manicure and Doree made a beautiful challah for Rosh Hashanah. Then, listeners call in for tips on how to wash makeup brushes on the regular, how to make a shower as restorative as a bath, and what to do when your fave moistur...
description:
Kate gets a life-changing manicure and Doree made a beautiful challah for Rosh Hashanah. Then, listeners call in for tips on how to wash makeup brushes on the regular, how to make a shower as restorative as a bath, and what to do when your fave moisturizer is discontinued!


  • To leave a voicemail or text for a future episode, reach them at 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com.
  • Visit forever35podcast.com for links to everything they mention on the show.
  • Follow the podcast on Twitter (@Forever35Pod) and Instagram (@Forever35Podcast) and join the Forever35 Facebook Group (Password: Serums). 
  • Sign up for the newsletter! At forever35podcast.com/newsletter 


This episode is sponsored by:
